cgcloud__Org_Unit_Hierarchy__c.name: cgcloud__Org_Unit_Hierarchy__c
cgcloud__Org_Unit_Hierarchy__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between two org units. It's typically used for the sales org unit hierarchy.

cgcloud__Child_Org_Unit__c.description: Reference to a child org unit in an org unit hierarchy.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user specific language.

cgcloud__Parent_Org_Unit__c.description: Reference to the parent org unit in an org unit hierachy.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Hyperlink to the detail page of the record.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the entry is valid.
